symptoms.name: fever
symptoms.description: Elevated body temperature above normal range

symptoms.name: headache
symptoms.description: Pain or discomfort in the head or neck area

symptoms.name: cough
symptoms.description: Reflex action to clear the throat and breathing passages

symptoms.name: fatigue
symptoms.description: Extreme tiredness or lack of energy

symptoms.name: nausea
symptoms.description: Feeling of sickness with an inclination to vomit

symptoms.name: chest_pain
symptoms.description: Pain or discomfort in the chest area

symptoms.name: shortness_of_breath
symptoms.description: Difficulty breathing or feeling breathless

symptoms.name: abdominal_pain
symptoms.description: Pain or discomfort in the abdominal area

symptoms.name: dizziness
symptoms.description: Feeling of lightheadedness or unsteadiness

symptoms.name: joint_pain
symptoms.description: Pain or discomfort in joints

symptoms.name: back_pain
symptoms.description: Pain or discomfort in the back area

symptoms.name: muscle_pain
symptoms.description: Pain or discomfort in muscles

symptoms.name: sore_throat
symptoms.description: Pain or irritation in the throat

symptoms.name: runny_nose
symptoms.description: Excessive nasal discharge

symptoms.name: congestion
symptoms.description: Blocked or stuffy nose

symptoms.name: sneezing
symptoms.description: Involuntary expulsion of air from the nose and mouth

symptoms.name: rash
symptoms.description: Area of irritated or swollen skin

symptoms.name: itching
symptoms.description: Uncomfortable sensation that causes the desire to scratch

symptoms.name: swelling
symptoms.description: Abnormal enlargement of a body part

symptoms.name: weight_loss
symptoms.description: Unintentional reduction in body weight

symptoms.name: weight_gain
symptoms.description: Increase in body weight

symptoms.name: insomnia
symptoms.description: Difficulty falling asleep or staying asleep

symptoms.name: anxiety
symptoms.description: Feeling of worry, nervousness, or unease

symptoms.name: depression
symptoms.description: Persistent feeling of sadness and loss of interest

symptoms.name: memory_loss
symptoms.description: Difficulty remembering information or events

conditions.name: common_cold

conditions.name: migraine

conditions.description: Immune system response to a foreign substance

conditions.name: depression

conditions.name: diabetes

conditions.name: arthritis
